Sentencas: Lowering operating temperature is the main direction of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85-(Li/Na)2CO3 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: Exploitation of new electrolytes with excellent performance is urgently required to develop low-temperature SOFCs, operating at 300-600 degrees C. A series of composite materials consisting of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 (LSGM) and a binary eutectic carbonates (52 mol% Li2CO3:48 mol% Na2CO3) were investigated with respect to their structure, morphology and ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85-(Li/Na)2CO3 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The structure study showed only LSGM phase could be found in the composites.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85-(Li/Na)2CO3 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The morphology study showed the composition could prevent LSGM particles from agglomeration, forming a homogenous composite.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85-(Li/Na)2CO3 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The conductivity was measured in air, nitrogen and hydrogen, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85-(Li/Na)2CO3 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The composite electrolytes showed much higher conductivity than the pure LSGM at evaluated temperatures, 0.122 S cm(-1) at 600 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85-(Li/Na)2CO3 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: A sharp conductivity jump appeared at 450 degrees C for composite electrolytes with various carbonate contents in air.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85-(Li/Na)2CO3 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The conductivity study showed different transition temperature but comparable conductivities in different atmosphere.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85-(Li/Na)2CO3 composite electrolytes
